channel.title: github-pages on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in github-pages on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Hugo: custom css, social-follow, svg, baseurl, comments
item.description: hugo social buttons It stated with wanting to add social buttons on my web page. This was as easy as changing the config.toml file. For Ananke theme, it is looking for some parameters, in the [params] sections. Just add you link to facebook, twitter, etc as facebook = "https://www.facebook.com/ID". case of missing id I was upset that it had a slack link available, but no discord one. One because I don’t even know what is one’s slack id.
